original_title: La Verdadera Cara de la Oposición Venezolana
overview: Venezuela is one of the most important countries in Latin America in terms of its resources, which is why it has always had great economic potential as a nation. However, a great crisis is currently being experienced in the country that affects all social, economic and political areas. For more than 60 years, this nation has been governed by fundamental parties of the left. This ideology had been gently applied in the 20th century, but in the last 20 years it has become more present.
title: La Verdadera Cara de la Oposición Venezolana
